title: KurangKerjaan
author: KurangKerjaan
content: The GreenChain A decentralized and eco-friendly blockchain that enables everyone to farm by using their free disk storage We are using Proof of Storage and Time consensus mechanism which is a huge leap forward in the blockchain world.TheGreenChain Features & Utility- TheGreen Swap Platform- TheGreenChain Proof-Of-Stake Platform- Security- TheGreenChain Mainnet BlockchainTheGreenChain Tokenomics- Liquidity 5% - Marketing 4%- Buyback 2%- Go Green Fund 1%TheGreenChain Officials Link :Fairlaunch Countdown time : https://thegreenchain.network/ Telegram : https://t.me/thegreenchain
